2017.title: PHP 7.0.6
2017.description: PHP 7 introduced improved performance, reduced memory usage, and new language features like scalar type declarations and return type declarations.

2017.title: Sublime Text 3
2017.description: Sublime Text 3 is a sophisticated text editor for code, markup, and prose with Symbol Indexing, Pane management, and a fast API.

2017.title: Laravel 5.3
2017.description: A PHP framework following MVC architecture, with features like driver-based notifications, Laravel Echo, OAuth2 via Passport, and full-text model searching.

2017.title: Symfony 3.0
2017.description: A PHP web application framework offering decoupled components and improved architecture over Symfony 2.x.

2017.title: CodeIgniter 3.1.2
2017.description: Lightweight PHP framework providing a set of classes for rapid web app development and minimal coding.
